actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that if a $1 coin is minted to replace the $1 bill, the Secretary of the Treasury should be authorized to mint and circulate $1 coins bearing the likeness of Margaret Chase Smith.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that if a one-dollar coin is minted to replace the $1 bill, the Secretary of the Treasury should be authorized to mint and circulate $1 coins bearing a likeness of Margaret Chase Smith.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that if a $1 coin is minted to replace the $1 bill, the Secretary of the Treasury should be authorized to mint and circulate $1 coins bearing the likeness of Margaret Chase Smith.
